@source-hash: 28940dd5e401afc8

## Purpose
Package initialization file for the IDNA (Internationalized Domain Names in Applications) library, serving as the main public API entry point. Consolidates domain name encoding/decoding functionality and validation utilities from multiple internal modules.

## Key Exports

### Version Information
- `__version__` (L1): Package version string imported from package_data module

### Core IDNA Functionality (L2-21)
Primary domain name processing functions from .core module:
- `encode()`: Converts Unicode domain names to ASCII-compatible encoding (ACE)
- `decode()`: Converts ACE-encoded domain names back to Unicode
- `alabel()`: Creates ASCII-compatible labels
- `ulabel()`: Creates Unicode labels
- `uts46_remap()`: Applies UTS46 Unicode mapping rules

### Validation Functions (L8-20)
Domain name validation utilities:
- `check_label()`: Validates individual domain labels
- `check_bidi()`: Validates bidirectional text requirements
- `check_hyphen_ok()`: Validates hyphen placement rules
- `check_initial_combiner()`: Validates combining character placement
- `check_nfc()`: Validates Unicode normalization
- `valid_label_length()`: Validates label length constraints
- `valid_string_length()`: Validates overall string length
- `valid_contextj()`: Validates CONTEXTJ rule compliance
- `valid_contexto()`: Validates CONTEXTO rule compliance

### Exception Classes (L3-6)
- `IDNAError`: Base exception for IDNA processing errors
- `IDNABidiError`: Specific exception for bidirectional text violations
- `InvalidCodepoint`: Exception for invalid Unicode codepoints
- `InvalidCodepointContext`: Exception for invalid codepoint usage context

### Utility Functions (L22)
- `intranges_contain()`: Integer range containment testing from .intranges module

## Dependencies
- `.package_data`: Version metadata
- `.core`: Primary IDNA processing logic
- `.intranges`: Integer range utilities

## Public API
The `__all__` declaration (L24-44) explicitly defines the complete public API surface, ensuring controlled exposure of 18 functions and exception classes for domain name internationalization.
